Also, I obsessively keep tweaking my vim + tmux setup ğŸ”¨. If you use/want to use either of these, we will get along pretty well ğŸ¤ğŸ½

Apart from Software, I spend a large part of my weekends making and listening to music ğŸµ. I've been playing the guitar since I was 11 ğŸ¸. I am no David Gilmore, but over the years I've gotten comfortable enough with the instrument to replicate what I hear and put my spin on it ğŸ‘¾.

For the past couple of years, I've been experimenting with electronic music. I use a little 2 Octave MIDI keyboard to sample sounds and create music out of it ğŸ¹. This combined with the guitar is my favorite pass time.
